findings.title: Potential Subtraction Underflow
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to change the timeStacked and timeOfLastUpdate of a user's staking record.

findings.title: Transfers Contract's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to claim all the balance of reward tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Performant Data Type
findings.description: The StakedToken struct stores stakerâ€™s address, which can be replaced with a boolean indicator for better performance.

findings.title: Decimals Precision Inconsistency
findings.description: The decimals field of a contract's ERC20 token can cause problems when interacting with other contracts.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: Missing Events Access Control
findings.description: Some functions do not emit events, making it difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The order of operations in arithmetic calculations can cause loss of precision.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables configured on user-supplied input are missing proper checks for zero values.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The ^ symbol in the compiler version can lead to compatibility issues.

findings.title: Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful. Otherwise, the contract may wrongly assume that the transfer has been established.

findings.title: Unlocked Pragma Version
findings.description: An unexpected version may produce vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.
